title: Cannon Fodder Counterattack System - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Fantasy   Romance   Sci-fi   Supernatural   Yaoi
tags: Ancient Times   Beastkin   Charismatic Protagonist   Child Abuse   Clever Protagonist   Devoted Love Interests   Episodic   Game Elements   Ghosts   Handsome Male Lead   Human-Nonhuman Relationship   Modern Day   Mpreg   Multiple Personalities   Multiple Realms   Past Trauma   Possessive Characters   Post-apocalyptic   Protagonist Strong from the Start   Revenge   Showbiz   Special Abilities   System Administrator   Transmigration   World Hopping   Zombies
author: Jiang Zhi   将至
description:
Encountering a car crash, the King of Silver Screen, Ye Sinian, was bound to a Cannon Fodder Counterattack System.

After reincarnating for hundreds of lives, he has finally earned enough “travel expenses” to go back home.

However, he didn’t think that the system would suddenly malfunction, making returning back home from then on hopeless.

With the shackles of a millennium broken, Ye Sinian aggressively counterattacked!

Reversing fates while hugging the mentally ill* Lord Gong, he walked towards the apex of humanity!

*Mentally ill – Schizophrenic>
